Class MenuController

java.lang.Object
main.java.com.team.game.controller.MenuController
public class MenuController extends Object
Controller for the main menu screen.

Handles navigation between the various sections of the game, such as starting a new round, managing sessions, updating user details, viewing leaderboards, and exiting the application.
